text: Arsenide is an ion. Its chemical formula is As3-. Most arsenides have arsenic in its -3 oxidation state. Ionic arsenides are very basic and are strong reducing agents. Most arsenides are more metallic, like zinc arsenide. Arsenides react with acids to make arsine gas. ==Related pages== *Nitride *Phosphide *Antimonide Category:Arsenic compounds Category:Anions
title: Arsenide
